remarks: Version of ~ cbv2 with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-cbv2v.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
bj-cbv2v.2 $e |- F/ y ph $.
bj-cbv2v.3 $e |- ( ph -> F/ y ps ) $.
bj-cbv2v.4 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x ch ) $.
bj-cbv2v.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( x = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) ) $.
bj-cbv2v $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x ps <-> A. y ch ) ) $.
$d x y $.
